snippet: Vladimir Putin is up to his old ways in actively helping the Syrian dictator, Bashar al-Assad, and trying to silence all dissenting voices at home. He should know that the world is watching.
abstract: Editorial criticizes Russian Pres Vladimir Putin's record both at home and abroad, singling out in particular his support for the Syrian government and his efforts to curb Russians' right to demonstrate freely; urges the Obama administration to make clear to Putin that the world is watching him closely.
lead_paragraph: Vladimir Putin is up to his old ways in actively helping the Syrian dictator, Bashar al-Assad, and trying to silence all dissenting voices at home. He should know that the world is watching.
